name: phylogenetic-tree
title: PhylogeneticTree
description: A branching diagram that shows the evolutionary relationships between dwc:Organisms.

fields.name: phylogeneticTreeID
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: phylogeneticTreeProtocol
fields.description: The names of, references to, or descriptions of the methods or protocols used in making a PhylogeneticTree.

fields.name: phylogeneticTreeProtocolID
fields.description: An identifier for the Protocol used to make an PhylogeneticTree.

fields.name: phylogeneticTreeCitation
fields.description: A list (concatenated and separated) of identifiers (publication, bibliographic reference, global unique identifier, URI) of literature associated with a PhylogeneticTree.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to separate the values in a list with space vertical bar space (` | `).
